title: VMware security advisory (AV25-796)
description: Between November 30 and December 1, 2025, VMware published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple Tanzu products.
products: Foundation Core for VMware Tanzu Platform  versions prior to 3.1.5-build.398
Foundation Core for VMware Tanzu Platform  versions prior to 3.2.1-build.271
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
